summary: Class that models a three‑controlled NOT gate realized with relative‑phase simplifications, following the circuit construction from the referenced research. It provides a gate object that can be added to a quantum circuit through the appropriate circuit method.
business_intent: Offer a resource‑efficient version of a triple‑controlled operation for quantum algorithms, allowing reduced gate count and depth when the gate’s phase differences are irrelevant because it will be uncomputed later.
